meaning_str.bing:
adj. 失望的；沮丧的；失意的
v. “disappoint”的过去式和过去分词
网络. 感到失望的；败兴；怅怅

感到失望的；失望的；沮丧的；扫兴的；希望落空的；感到泄气的；失意的
使失望；使（希望）落空；使破灭；（disappoint的过去式和过去分词）

1.en: Here's a few of the best from the collection, even if our own Danger Room was a bit disappointed by the CIA's choices.
1.cn: 以下是从中精选的一组照片，但即便如此，《连线》的“威胁研究室”栏目对中情局选择公开的装置还是稍感失望。

2.en: The US did not agree to the panel and was disappointed that Canada had chosen to move forward with a request for a panel.
2.cn: 美国不同意建立专家组并对加拿大提出请求建立专家组表示失望。

3.en: Curious, but somewhat disappointed the young man opened the box and found a lovely, leather-bound Bible.
3.cn: 年轻人既好奇又有点失望的打开礼盒，发现里面是一本漂亮的、皮面的《圣经》。

0.en: Just tell her I can't come. She'll be disappointed if we don't show up.
0.cn: 你就跟她说我有事去不了了嘛。如果我们不去，她会很失望的。

1.en: He will never be disappointed with you. You're the best thing that's ever happened to him. Thank you.
1.cn: 他永远都不会对你失望的，你是他今生最好的礼物。谢谢。

2.en: In turn, son fails to protect the kingdom by giving me the key. Mum would be very disappointed. Wouldn't she?
2.cn: 所以，儿子为了保护这个国家就需要把钥匙给我，妈妈可是会很失望的，不是吗？

3.en: The Fourth of July means nothing anymore. Overcooked hot dogs and fireworks that always leave you disappointed.
3.cn: 国庆节已经变得毫无意义。烤焦的热狗，永远令你失望的焰火。

5.en: Really, Amy? Gossip? I'm disappointed in you.
5.cn: 你开玩笑吧？艾米？跟我聊八卦？我对你失望了。

6.en: I feel terrible. Please don't be too disappointed.
6.cn: 我觉得很愧疚，求求你不要对我失望。

7.en: She's 93. She won't be disappointed for very long.
7.cn: 她都九十三岁了，也失望不了几年了。

8.en: And I could only make out one word. "Disappointed."
8.cn: 我勉强听到两个字，失望。

9.en: Well then, I'm sure your family will be very disappointed.
9.cn: 那想必你家人会很失望。

10.en: For the record, I'm not disappointed. You know, you said I would be disappointed when I met you, but I'm not.
10.cn: 顺便说一下，我没有失望。你说过我见到你会失望，但是我没有。

11.en: I'm sorry I disappointed you. I am disappointed. But not because you didn't find it. But because you did. And you lied.
11.cn: 抱歉我让你失望了。我是失望。但不是因为你没找到。是因为你找到了。但你却撒谎了。

12.en: I don't want him to be disappointed with this life. With me.
12.cn: 我不想他对这种生活失望，和我一起的生活。

13.en: You're right. I'm not. Now are you satisfied? No. Just disappointed.
13.cn: 你说的对，我不是，现在你满意了吗？不！我只是觉得失望。

14.en: I'm disappointed, Donald. But I understand. And I won't pressure you.
14.cn: 我好失望，唐纳德。但我理解，我不会逼迫你。

15.en: Simba, I'm very disappointed in you. I know. You could've been killed.
15.cn: 辛巴，我对你非常失望，我知道你可能会死掉。

16.en: What did she say? Enough. I find I'm most disappointed in Tony Gillingham.
16.cn: 她说了什么？不少了，我对托尼·吉利安姆十分失望。

17.en: Dearest Papa, I hope you're not too disappointed. Don't be silly. Not at all.
17.cn: 亲爱的爸爸，我希望您没有太失望。别傻了，才不会呢。

18.en: I should have known. I expect big things from you. Well, you won't be disappointed.
18.cn: 我早该想到，期待你有出色表现。你包准不会失望。

19.en: Look, try to see things from my point of view. I am extremely disappointed with my life.
19.cn: 听着，试着从我的角度考虑考虑，我对自己的生活失望透顶。
